page.title: 13BOYS GAMES_1985
page.content: Here are some of the favourite boys games at Lydbrook school. {Headers and Volleys This game is played with a football. Each player has the same number of points,except the person who is in goal who has one point more than the rest.There are boundery lines and if the football goes over the lines the person who kicked it is in goal.Once you get down to 0 points the game is over.The last point has to be scored by a header. {Hand Stands In Hand Stands someone is responsible for calling " Ready steady go". Everyone then does a handstand.The person who stays up the longest is then responsible for calling out"Ready steady go".This person is known as being 'On it'.
